title: ABR VisAsset
description: A visualization asset (VisAsset) for the Artifact-Based Rendering engine

artifactData.description: File names which store the actual VisAsset's data

class.description: High-level descriptor of the artifact (e.g. 'point' glyph or 'divergent' colormap)

family.description: Low-level descriptor of the artifact (e.g. 'haiku' glyph or 'Blue' colormap)

preview.description: File name for the thumbnail icon for this VisAsset

type.description: Type of VisAsset; DOES NOT directly correspond to names in ABR!

artist.description: Name of the artist who created this VisAsset

hidden.description: Should this VisAsset be hidden in the Library or not?

tags.description: List of tags to associate this VisAsset with
